Summary: Two bright lights following each other, perfectly parallel, turned red/orange and dissapeared, movement WEST SOUTH WEST to EAST NORTH EAST
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around September 8th 2009
divs: sighting detailsmy brother was in the backyard having a beer with a neighbor, he called me and said run outside you have to see this, ran out and looked up and saw two bright lights. objects were similar to stars following each other perfectly perpendicular, one behind the other. objects were travelling at high speeds, (almost as fast as a shooting star), but perfectly straight. i could not believe my eyes, i have seen many shooting stars, satellites, weather ballons, fast jets, rockets, etc. this was completely deferent in movement, and speed. there were travelling from wsw to ene. i saw the light\star like objects turn red\orange and vanished what looked to be in an up motion.
